item.title: Why the Saints are turning to QB Tyler Shough now
item.description: After benching Spencer Rattler during their Week 8 loss, the Saints will start their second-round pick Sunday.

item.title: 200 plays on a wristband?! Why some NFL QBs wear play sheets on their wrists and others don't
item.description: Some QBs like the way wristbands speed up the process, but others, such as Dak Prescott, don't want to lose eye contact.

item.title: Facts vs. Feelings: Why you may want to sit Bo Nix, start Travis Hunter and trade Christian McCaffrey
item.description: Liz has feelings about who you should start and sit this week and a fact to consider about Christian McCaffrey

item.title: NFL matchup rankings: Upgrade Daniel Jones, downgrade Travis Kelce
item.description: The most and least favorable matchups for Week 9 at quarterback, running back, wide receiver and tight end.

item.title: Banged-up Bears add veteran Gardner-Johnson
item.description: The Bears have signed C.J. Gardner-Johnson, adding the veteran safety to their injury-depleted secondary.
